### Using iPython


 1. Make sure you have python https://www.python.org/download/releases/2.7.8/
 2. Install SciPy http://www.scipy.org/install.html
 3. Install ipython, use the command line:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
$ pip install ipython
```
 4. To load ipython, use the command line:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
$ cd your/590/folder
$ ipython notebook
```

iPython will open up in your browser. if you already have ipython notebooks in your directory, they will show up. 

Try downloading the notebooks from these sites:

By Josh Hemann: http://nbviewer.ipython.org/gist/jhemann/4569783

By Julia Evans: https://www.wakari.io/sharing/bundle/jvns/PyData%20NYC%202013%20tutorial
